titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the American Folklife Center for fiscal years 1994, 1995, 1996, and 1997.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4140-4141)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. With written report No. 103-47.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 68.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Libraries and Memorials.

bill.summary: 3/31/1993--Introduced. Amends the American Folklife Preservation Act to authorize appropriations for the American Folklife Center for FY 1994 through 1997.
